TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ModelItemExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implements extensions to the base model item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Focus(class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem item) cil managed

Docs.param: The designer item to set focus on.
Docs.summary: Sets the keyboard focus on the specified designer item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the specified designer item is not visible in the model tree view, this method expands the model tree up to a parent that is no more than five levels up.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Focus (this System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem item, int level);
.method public static hidebysig void Focus(class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem item, int32 level) cil managed

Docs.param: The designer item to set focus on.
The maximum number of levels used to set a limit on the expansion of the model tree if the specified designer item is not visible.
Docs.summary: Sets the keyboard focus on the specified designer item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the specified designer item is not visible in the model tree view, this method expands the model tree up to a parent that is no more than a maximum number of levels up specified by the `level` parameter.
